original: EKWALL, Axel, Civilingenjör, Gävle, f Vass-ända-Naglum, Älvsb l, 14/2 08 av övering Axel E o Ottonie Ericson. Studex NLatin Sthlm 26, civ.ing KTH 31. Anst h Billeruds AB 32— 44, varav ss kemist v Billeruds sulfitfabr o pappersbruk 32—33 o ss bitr driftsing v Jös-sefors sulfitfabr o pappersbruk 33—41, anst h Korsnäs Sågverks AB ss driftsing v Korsnäsverken fr 44. KTH:s stip t Finl 38, Sv-Amerika Stift:s o KTH:s stip t USA 41—43. Av trycket: NKI-skolans lärokurs i sulfit-tekn, tekn upps i facktidskr. Led av Sv Tekn-frn o Sv Pappers- o Cellulosaing.frn.
translated: EKWALL, Axel, Civil Engineer, Gävle, b. Vass-ända-Naglum, Älvsb l, 14/2 08, son of Major Axel E and Ottonie Ericson. Graduated NLatin Sthlm 26, civil engineer from KTH 31. Employed at Billeruds AB 32— 44, including as a chemist at Billeruds sulfitfabr and paper mill 32—33, and as an assistant technical engineer at Jös-sefors sulfitfabr and paper mill 33—41. Employed at Korsnäs Sågverks AB as a technical engineer at Korsnäsverken from 44. Scholarship from KTH for Finland 38, Scholarship from Sv-Amerika Stift and KTH for USA 41—43. Published: NKI-skolan's educational course in sulfite technology, technical articles in professional journals. Member of the Swedish Technical Association and the Swedish Pulp and Cellulose Engineering Association.

scholarships.name: Sv-Amerika Stift and KTH for USA

publications.name: NKI-skolan's educational course in sulfite technology

memberOf.name: Swedish Pulp and Cellulose Engineering Association
